mapper.select: /* TodoMapper.getTodoPreListRetrieve */ SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS TODO.* FROM (SELECT TD_ID AS td_id , TD_NM AS td_nm , TD_TP AS td_tp , DATE_FORMAT(TD_DATE, CONCAT('%Y-%m-%d', ' ', '%H:%i')) AS td_date , DATE_FORMAT(TD_UPD_DATE, CONCAT('%Y-%m-%d', ' ', '%H:%i')) AS td_upd_date , DATE_FORMAT(TD_LAST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS td_last_date , USER_NM AS user_nm , USER_IDX AS user_idx FROM TB_TODO ORDER BY TD_DATE DESC) AS TODO WHERE 1=1 AND USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND TD_TP = '00' LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
